models

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Model. Represents a model as configured by Model.config ,i.e. which fields from inputfiles are relevant and how are they to be processed into model variables, and Model.coeff ,i.e. which coefficients are assigned to which variables (incl. intercept)
